name: Why Not Try Another Route?
description:
Hello!

This is a silly little concept piece I made in 2 hours. Had the idea in a lecture, sat down and cranked it out, made the music that night in about 30 minutes. 

Just a fun little experiment, a 2D platforming game about perspective and thinking outside the box: get the man to the exit, but how?

The character model, animations, movement controller etc. is Unity standard assets. Rest was meeeee.

Have fun!
